thread.title: Brooke
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Brooke

author: Brooke
title: Brooke
text: When I walked in the door I noticed that Ben did not crowd me while I took my time looking at choices of dining sets. He was very helpful when I did have questions and helped me problem solve my dining room choices without any salesmen agenda which I really appreciated. He helped with ideas, clearly knew all policies about delivery and set up. He was professional in every way. I have been in a lot of furniture stores across DFW lately and it was clear, your selection was good and Ben was a top notch salesman.
